title: 95/60/EC: Commission Decision of 6 March 1995 amending Decision 94/381/EC concerning certain protection measures with regard to bovine spongiform encephalopathy and the feeding of mammalian derived protein (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 March 1995 amending Decision 94/381/EC concerning certain protection measures with regard to bovine spongiform encephalopathy and the feeding of mammalian derived protein (Text with EEA relevance) (95/60/EC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is added to Article 1 of Decision 94/381/EC:
'3. The prohibition mentioned in paragraph 1 shall not apply to:
- milk,
- gelatin,
- amino acids produced from hides and skins by a process which involves exposure of the material to a pH of 1 to 2 followed by a pH of > 11 followed by heat treatment at 140 Â°C for 30 minutes at 3 bar,
- dicalcium phosphate derived from defatted bones,
- dried plasma and other blood products.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
